message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I think it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe I can come to an agreement at a lower price. Would you consider selling the product for $120?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $120 is too low for me. How about $135?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I think we can find a middle ground. Would you consider selling the product for $130?
